Field.name: VAL
Field.Match: VAL bit is set. This bank contains a valid MCE.

Field.name: OVER
Field.Match: Overflow-A 2nd MCE occurred before previous error was read and cleared.

Field.name: MISCV
Field.Match: MCi_MISC is valid. See decoding below.

Field.name: ADDRV
Field.Match: MCi_ADDR is valid. See decoding below.

Field.name: S
Field.Match: MCE generated for UC (but recoverable) error.

Field.name: AR
Field.Match: Software may defer the recovery action till a later point.

Field.name: Threshold-based Erorr Status Indicator
Field.Match: Yellow. Operating correctly but with degraded status.

Field.name: MSCOD
Field.Match: Home Agent write data parity error
Home Agent write BE parity error

Field.name: MSCOD
Field.Match: CBO SAD error WB to MMIO
CBO SAD error IA accesss to GSM

Field.name: MCACOD
Field.Match: BINIT# from another CPU caused error
BINIT# from another CPU caused error
Cache Hierarchy Error in Cache Level 0 L1
Cache Hierarchy Error in Cache Level 1 L2
Cache Hierarchy Error in Cache Level 2 L3
Cache Hierarchy Error in Cache Level Generic LG

Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Instruction in Cache Level 1 L2
Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Instruction in Cache Level 2 L3
Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Instruction in Cache Level Generic LG

Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Data in Cache Level 1 L2
Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Data in Cache Level 2 L3

Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Generic in Cache Level 1 L2
Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Generic in Cache Level 2 L3
Cache Hirarchy Error during Transaction Type=Generic in Cache Level Generic LG
Local processor observed error as third party

Field.name: Error 16
Field.Match: Enable LL Debug FLIT CRC Error

Field.name: Error 15
Field.Match: Enable LL Route back table error

Field.name: Error 14
Field.Match: Enable LL Rx L0p Retrain Error

Field.name: Error 12
Field.Match: Enable LL Unsupported/undefined Packet (Bad Packet) Error

Field.name: Error 11
Field.Match: Enable LL Tx Unsuccessful Link Layer Retry Error

Field.name: Error 02
Field.Match: Enable Phy Detected Drift Buffer Alarm

Field.name: Corr_Read_Error
Field.Match: Enables exception signalling for normal read errors

Field.name: Addr_error
Field.Match: Enable exception signaling for address errors

Field.name: HA_Wr_Buffer_ByteEnable_Error
Field.Match: Enable exception signaling for HA Write Buffer Byte Enable errors

Field.name: HA_Wr_Buffer_Date_Error
Field.Match: Enable exception signaling for HA Write Buffer data errors

Field.name: Data_Scrub_error
Field.Match: Enable exception signaling for data scrubbing errors.

Field.name: Data_Spare_error
Field.Match: Enable exception signaling for data sparing errors

Field.name: SAD_NON_CORRUPING_ERR_OTHER
Field.Match: Enables SAD: Other sources of LLC noncorrupting errors

Field.name: SAD_CORRUPING_ERR_OTHER
Field.Match: Enable SAD: Other sources of LLC corrupting errors

Field.name: SAD_ERR_IA_Access_to_MESEG
Field.Match: Enable SAD: Enables SAD error for IA access to MESeg Region

Field.name: SAD_ERR_WB_TO_TYPE
Field.Match: Enable SAD: Enables signaling of Uncorrected error

Field.name: LLC_data_error
Field.Match: Enable LLC: Uncorrected Data Error Flag
Channel with memory error being reported %d

Field.name: MSCOD
Field.Match: Uncorrectable: Unsupported Config Request from Message Channel
Uncorrectable: Link Layer RBT used un-initialized value
Uncorrectable: Link Layer L0p Retrain error
Uncorrectable: QPI Link Layer Detected Control Error
Uncorrectable: QPI Link Layer detected Unsupported/Undefined Packet
Uncorrectable: Rx detected CRC error -- Unsuccessful Link Level Retry - entered LLR abort state
Uncorrectable: QPI Link Layer Detected R3QPI Control Error
Uncorrectable: QPI Physical Layer Detected Drift Buffer Alarm
Uncorrectable: QPI Physical Layer Control Error
Correctable: Tx CRC Error (initiates LLR_Req sequence)
Correctable: Rx CRC Error with LLR Success (no phy re-init)
Correctable: Rx CRC Error with LLR Success after phy re-init
Correctable: Phy In-band Reset completed successfully with no width change
Correctable: QPI Physical Layer Detected a QPI in-band Reset but aborted initialization

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_14_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 14 (LL Rx L0p Retrain Error) signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_13_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 13 (LL Control Error) signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_12_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 12 (LL Unsupported/undefined Packet (Bad Packet) Error) signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_11_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 11 (LL Tx Unsuccessful Link Layer Retry Error) signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_10_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 10 (R3QPI General Control Error) signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_03_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 03 (Phy Latency Buffer Overflow) signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_02_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 02 (Phy Detected Drift Buffer Alarm)signaling

Field.name: EN_QPI_ERR_00_SIGNALING
Field.Match: Enable the QPI Error 00 (Phy Generic Control Error) signaling

Field.name: ENABLE_DSB
Field.Match: DSB (Data Sequencing Buffer) MCA error reporting enalbed

Field.name: ENABLE_IFU
Field.Match: IFU (Instruction Fetch Unit) MCA error reporting enalbed

Field.name: ENABLE_IQ
Field.Match: IQ (Instruction Queue) MCA error reporting enalbed

Field.name: ENABLE_MS
Field.Match: MS (Micro Sequencer) MCA error reporting enalbed

Field.name: ENABLE_ROB
Field.Match: ROB (Re-Order Buffer) MCA error reporting enalbed

Field.name: EN_DTLB
Field.Match: Enable all error reporting in the DTLB

Field.name: EN
Field.Match: Enable all error reporting in the DCU

Field.name: EN_DTLB
Field.Match: Enable all error reporting in the DTLB

Field.name: EN
Field.Match: Enable all error reporting in the DCU

Field.name: mlc_data_poison_error
Field.Match: Enable Uncorrectable MLC Data poison ECC Error

Field.name: mlc_mesi_state_error
Field.Match: Enable Uncorrectable MLC MESI State Array

Field.name: mlc_tag_error
Field.Match: Enable Uncorrectable MLC Tag ECC Error MCERR

Field.name: MSCOD
Field.Match: PCU Micro controller Generated Error - NON_IMEM_SEL
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - I_PARITY_ERROR
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - BAD_OPCODE
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - I_STACK_UNDERFLOW
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - I_STACK_OVERFLOW
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - D_STACK_UNDERFLOW
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - D_STACK_OVERFLOW
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - NON_DMEM_SEL
PCU Micro controller Generated Error - D_PARITY_ERROR
PCU Hardware Error detected on SVID bus
PCU Hardware Error detected on SVID bus
MCA_RCLK_PLL_LOCK_TIMEOUT During reset, RCLK PLL was not locked within time-out.
MCA_PCIE_PLL_LOCK_TIMEOUT During reset, PCI Express PLL was not locked within timeout.
MCA_BOOT_VID_SET_TIMEOUT During reset, setting the initial VID did not settled within time-out.
MCA_BOOT_FREQUENCY_SET_TIMEOUT During reset, locking the Ring PLL to boot ratio did not settled within time-out.
MCA_START_IA_CORES_TIMEOUT During reset, starting IA cores CRST-->C0 did not happen within time-out.
MCA_PMA_FUSE_DOWNLOAD_TIMEOUT During reset, the fuse download using PMA did not complete within time-out.
MCA_SSKU_CPU_OFF During reset, the FUSE_CPU_OFF fuse is set, but Soft SKU did not enable it (not even MTP).
MCA_PMA_DNS_COMMAND_TIMEOUT time-out while sending PMA Downstream command. Probably during reset.
MCA_MESSAGE_CHANNEL_TIMEOUT time-out while sending something to the Message Channel (posted or non-posted).
MCA_GVFSM_BGF_PROGRAM_TIMEOUT During reset, program PP0 BGFs timed-out.
MCA_MC_PLL_LOCK_TIMEOUT During reset, iMC PLL was not locked within time-out.
MCA_MC_BGF_PROGRAM_TIMEOUT During reset, program iMC BGFs timed-out.
MCA_IMC_FORCE_SR_S3_TIMEOUT Got time-out to force iMC self-refresh during Pkg S3.
MCA_CPD_UNCPD_S1_TIMEOUT During reset-warn flow, got time-out to CPD-S1 or to UNCPD-S1 direct GV.
MCA_PKGS_SAFE_WP_TIMEOUT During reset-warn flow, got time-out to change VID / Frequency
MCA_LLC_BIST_ACTIVE_TIMEOUT Got time-out on LLC-BIST active.
MCA_BULKCR_FSM_TIMEOUT Got time-out on Bulk CR FSM.
MCA_HARD_SKU_AUTO_DETECT_ERROR During cold reset, no IA cores are found, or something is found after a GT.
MCA_DMI_TRAINING_TIMEOUT During reset, DMI training failed to complete within time-out.
MCA_DMI_STRAP_SET_ARRIVAL_TIMEOUT During reset, DMI Strap Set message did not arrive within time-out.
DMI_CPU_RESET_ACK_TIMEOUT During reset, DMI message for CPU Reset Ack did not arrive within time-out.
MCA_PME_TO_ACK_TIMEOUT During reset-warn flow, PME turnoff did not ack within timeout. C-step: issued only in special DFX mode.
MCA_BANDING_COMMAND_TIMEOUT During reset, banding FSM didn't response within time-out during PLL banding process.
MCA_DE_RESET_WARN_ACK_TIMEOUT During reset-warn flow, DE did not ack within time-out.
MCA_PKGS_RECOVERY_MODE_TIMEOUT During reset-warn flow, got to recovery mode, but PCH did not ack.
MCA_PMACR_WRITE_TIMEOUT PMA CR write command time-out.
MCA_PMACR_READ_TIMEOUT PMA CR read command time-out.
MCA_DISPLAY_RCOMP_TIMEOUT During reset, the Display RCOMP timed-out.
MCA_PCIE_RCOMP_TIMEOUT During reset, the PCI Express RCOMP (first or second) timedout.
MCA_MEMORY_RCOMP_TIMEOUT During reset, the Memory RCOMP timed-out.
MCA_SVID_COMMAND_TIMEOUT SVID command time-out (busy bit was not cleared fast enough).
MCA_PKGC_DIRECT_WAKE_RING_TIMEOUT Got time-out to wake ring at PKGC direct GV. Review sighting 3876011
MCA_IMPH_VDM_CREDITS_TIMEOUT Got time-out during Soft SKU interaction, as iMPH does not return credits to PCU microcode.
MCA_IA_BOOT_RATIO_IS_SET_TO_ZERO Fuses are not burned correctly in this unit.
MCA_SHUTDOWN_GT_VID_TIMEOUT Issue VID decay to GT on warm reset during phase-1 did not complete within time-out.
MCA_PKGC_WATCHDOG_HANG_CBZ_DOWN Pkg C-state hanged at transient state: In Buffer Zone, going Down (towards C2/C3), waiting for PM_RSP(EA=0).
MCA_PKGC_WATCHDOG_HANG_CBZ_UP Pkg C-state hanged at transient state: In Buffer Zone, going Up (towards C0), waiting for PM_RSP(EA=1).
MCA_PKGC_WATCHDOG_HANG_C2_DOWN Pkg C-state hanged at transient state: In C2, going down towards C3. Ring Off was sent, but not ack.
MCA_PKGC_WATCHDOG_HANG_C2_WAIT_CF1 Pkg C-state hanged at transient state: In C2, when PM_REQ(CF=1) was sent, but not ack.
MCA_PKGC_WATCHDOG_HANG_C2_UP_LLC_ABORT Pkg C-state hanged at transient state: In C2, towards Buffer Zone, when LLC abort was sent, but not ack.
MCA_PKGC_WATCHDOG_HANG_C3_UP_SF Pkg C-state hanged at transient state: In C3, towards C2, slow/fast Voltage ramp. Waiting for GV FSM idle ack.
MCA_CPU_ONLY_CORES_TO_CC1_TIMEOUT Cores did not go to CC1 in time
MCA_CPU_ONLY_QET_EXPIRY_TIMEOUT The QET does not expire accordingly
MCA_CPU_ONLY_RESET_DEASSERTION_TIMEOUT RESET IN is never de-asserted
MCA_CRITICAL_VR_FAILED In Config SVID IFC it was detected that either Core VR or SA VR failed to respond.
MCA_ICC_MAX_NOTSUPPORTED Core VR does not support required current for the part.
MCA_VID_RAMP_DOWN_FAILED VID Ramp-down failed in phase 4.
MCA_EXCL_MODE_NO_PMREQ_CMP On Exclusive Mode entry, wait for QPI completion of PMReq messages timed out.
MCA_SVID_READ_REG_ICC_MAX_FAILED SVID command to read ICC_MAX register failed.
MCA_SVID_WRITE_REG_VOUT_MAX_FAILED SVID command to write VOUT MAX register failed.
MCA_SA_BOOT_VID_TIMEOUT time-out setting boot VID for SA PP
MCA_PP1_BOOT_VID_TIMEOUT time-out setting boot VID for PP1 (DRAM 0)
MCA_AUX_BOOT_VID_TIMEOUT time-out setting boot VID for AUX PP (DRAM 1)
MCA_QPI_PLL_LOCK_FAILED QPI PLL didn't lock (can happen in phase 1 and phase 4).
MCA_MC_PLL_LOCK_FAILED MC PLL didn't lock (can happen in phase 1 and phase 4).
MCA_UNCORE_CCOMP_TIMEOUT The uncore clock compensation did not complete within timeout.
MCA_RESET_RCLK_PLL_UNLOCK_TIMEOUT time-out when unlocking RCLK during warm reset
MCA_PCUIIO_BGF_TIMEOUT_START_DOWNLOAD Starting the PCU/IIOLink BGF timed out on setting the Download bit.
MCA_PCUIIO_BGF_TIMEOUT_START_RUN Starting the PCU/IIOLink BGF timed out on setting the Run bit.
MCA_PCUIIO_BGF_TIMEOUT_STOP Stopping the PCU/IIOLink BGF timed out.
MCA_SMA_FAILED Small array init did not initialize within the time-out
MCA_MORE_THAN_ONE_LT_AGENT During Boot Mode Processing, >1 LT Agent detected
MCA_BAD_MC_REFCLK_SYNCPULSE_COMBO During reset, programming of the PCU/IIOLink BGF encountered a time-out.
MCA_INVALID_PKGS_REQ_PCH PkgS Master detected improper request from PCH
MCA_INVALID_PKGS_REQ_QPI PkgS Slave detected improper request from Master
MCA_INVALID_PKGS_RSP_QPI PkgS Master detected improper response from Slave
MCA_INVALID_PKGC_RSP_PCH PkgC Master detected improper response from PCH for EA request
MCA_INVALID_PKG_STATE_CONFIG Invalid pkg-state configuration detected (Master and no slave mask)
MCA_QUIESCE_MSG_CH_DRIVER_TIMEOUT Message channel driver: time-out when quiescing the IOs
MCA_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT_PKGC_SLAVE PkgC slave timed-out waiting for PmRsp from Master
MCA_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT_PKGC_MASTER PkgC master timed-out waiting for PmRsp from PCH
MCA_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT_PKGS_MASTER PkgS master timed-out waiting for PmRsp from slave
MCA_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT_MSG_CH_FSM time-out waiting for IO_MESSAGE_CHANNEL FSM to go idle
MCA_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT_BULK_CR_FSM time-out waiting for SA_BULK_CR_READ FSM to go idle
MCA_MSGCH_PMREQ_CMP_TIMEOUT time-out waiting for PMReq.CMP to be set - MsgCh driver
MCA_MSGCH_HALT_TIMEOUT time-out waiting for MsgCh Run/Busy in HALT routine
MCA_HA_RW_BLOCK_ACK_TIMEOUT time-out waiting for BlockAck from HA in S3/RW flow
MCA_IMC_RW_BLOCK_ACK_TIMEOUT time-out waiting for BlockAck from iMC in S3/RW flow
MCA_IMC_RW_SMBUS_TIMEOUT time-out waiting for iMC SMBUS not-busy in S3/RW flow
MCA_HA_FAILSTS_CHANGE_DETECTED Detected change in HACHFAILSTS - mirroring fail-over error detected
MCA_PCIE_R2PCIE_RW_BLOCK_ACK_TIMEOUT time-out waiting for BlockAck from PCIE or R2PCIE in CPU Only Reset flow
MCA_RECOVERABLE_DIE_THERMAL_TOO_HOT During slow loop, it was detected that internal die thermals is too hot.
MCA_RECOVERABLE_EDP_CANT_ATTAIN_PN_IA When phase-4 complete, or during slow loop, discovered core cannot attain Pn in EDP calcs.
MCA_RECOVERABLE_EDP_CANT_ATTAIN_PN_GT When phase-4 complete, or during
